name: Tap ColorRush
description:
Tap ColorRush is a Fun Casual Game in which the Aim in the Game is to Survive as long as Possible( Probably beat our 70 Points highScore ) but for you to survive you have to interlock the falling tiles with the Ground tiles( The one you own ) also making sure they have the same Colour.

Use Space Key to switch among these colours; Red, Blue and Yellow.

Use 'X' Key to Change interlocking sides.

It is my First personal Game to be published on ITCH.IO, Play it, Enjoy it and leave a Comment please
